summary: This is a response from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to an FBI request for a search of the Interstate Identification Index (III) system. It indicates that records can be obtained through the III using the appropriate NCIC transaction.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: He is listed as the sender or responsible official for the communication from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to the FBI regarding an III record search.

events.title: III/FBI/State Delayed Response Communication
events.description: The New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services sends a response to an FBI inquiry regarding a search of the Interstate Identification Index (III).

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St. Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: The document is a law enforcement communication dated October 6, 2021.
It is a response from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to an FBI request for a search of the Interstate Identification Index (III).
The response states that records can be obtained through the III using the appropriate NCIC (National Crime Information Center) transaction.
Michael C. Green is identified as the Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services.
The document is part of the Epstein case data set, suggesting the III search request was related to the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein or his associates.
